GeneDef.label: abysmal mechanoid slayer
GeneDef.description: Due to some weird genetic manipulation of the carrier's brain, they find themselves almost incapable of dealing any notable damage to mechanoid targets.

GeneDef.label: extremely bad mechanoid slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have significant difficulty killing mechanoids, either because of a special wiring in their brains telling them to not destroy potential members of the mechanoid hive, or just general inexplicable physical incapability not yet explained by science.

GeneDef.label: very bad mechanoid slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have major issues when trying to kill mechanoids, either because of a special wiring in their brains telling them to not destroy potential members of the mechanoid hive, or just general inexplicable physical incapability not yet explained by science.

GeneDef.label: bad mechanoid slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have issues when trying to kill mechanoids, either because of a special wiring in their brains telling them to not destroy potential members of the mechanoid hive, or just general inexplicable physical incapability not yet explained by science.

GeneDef.label: somewhat good mechanoid slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know some of the weak points of any mechanoid they fight, making it easier to destroy them.

GeneDef.label: good mechanoid slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know a lot of the weak points of any mechanoid they fight, making it easier to destroy them.

GeneDef.label: very good mechanoid slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know most of the weak points of any mechanoid they fight, making it easier to destroy them.

GeneDef.label: extremely good mechanoid slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know every weak point of any mechanoid they fight, making it significantly easier to destroy them.

GeneDef.label: unbelievably good mechanoid slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know every weak point of any mechanoid they fight and have the ability to predict where the mechanoid will move next with a low accuracy rate, making it significantly easier to destroy them.\n\nAlite's note: Predictive ability doesn't really exist or do anything, it's just some fluff text that I use to be able to claim this gene makes complete sense.
